description: Describes the specified Scheduled Instances or all your Scheduled Instances.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. availability-zone - The Availability Zone (for example, us-west-2a). instance-type - The instance type (for example, c4.large). platform - The platform ( Linux/UNIX or Windows). (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

parameters.name: SlotStartTimeRange
parameters.description: The time period for the first schedule to start. EarliestTime (datetime) --- The earliest date and time, in UTC, for the Scheduled Instance to start. LatestTime (datetime) --- The latest date and time, in UTC, for the Scheduled Instance to start.

nested_params.name: EarliestTime
nested_params.description: The earliest date and time, in UTC, for the Scheduled Instance to start.

nested_params.name: LatestTime
nested_params.description: The latest date and time, in UTC, for the Scheduled Instance to start.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token required to retrieve the next set of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.

nested_items.name: ScheduledInstanceSet
nested_items.description: Information about the Scheduled Instances.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone.

nested_items.name: CreateDate
nested_items.description: The date when the Scheduled Instance was purchased.

nested_items.name: HourlyPrice
nested_items.description: The hourly price for a single instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type.

nested_items.name: NetworkPlatform
nested_items.description: The network platform.

nested_items.name: NextSlotStartTime
nested_items.description: The time for the next schedule to start.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The platform ( Linux/UNIX or Windows).

nested_items.name: PreviousSlotEndTime
nested_items.description: The time that the previous schedule ended or will end.

nested_items.name: Recurrence
nested_items.description: The schedule recurrence.

nested_items.name: Frequency
nested_items.description: The frequency ( Daily, Weekly, or Monthly).

nested_items.name: Interval
nested_items.description: The interval quantity. The interval unit depends on the value of frequency. For example, every 2 weeks or every 2 months.

nested_items.name: OccurrenceDaySet
nested_items.description: The days. For a monthly schedule, this is one or more days of the month (1-31). For a weekly schedule, this is one or more days of the week (1-7, where 1 is Sunday).
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: OccurrenceRelativeToEnd
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the occurrence is relative to the end of the specified week or month.

nested_items.name: OccurrenceUnit
nested_items.description: The unit for occurrenceDaySet ( DayOfWeek or DayOfMonth).

nested_items.name: ScheduledInstanceId
nested_items.description: The Scheduled Instance ID.

nested_items.name: SlotDurationInHours
nested_items.description: The number of hours in the schedule.

nested_items.name: TermEndDate
nested_items.description: The end date for the Scheduled Instance.

nested_items.name: TermStartDate
nested_items.description: The start date for the Scheduled Instance.

nested_items.name: TotalScheduledInstanceHours
nested_items.description: The total number of hours for a single instance for the entire term.
